product_name: The North Face Litewave Hiking Shoes - Women's
long_description: Prefer to do your hiking at lightning-fast pace? The Litewave Hiking Shoes from The North Face are built to offer comfortable support and cushioning with minimal weight so nothing holds you back. Water-resistant mesh uppers with welded seams are lightweight, breathable and ultra comfortable; thermoplastic urethane overlays provide structure and light support. EVA footbeds deliver 5mm of comfortable cushioning. Thermoplastic urethane shanks provide all-day support for long days on your feet. Rugged, durable UltrATAC(TM) rubber outsoles provide excellent traction on wet or uneven trails.
short_description: Prefer to do your hiking at lightning-fast pace? The Litewave Hiking Shoes from The North Face are built to offer comfortable support and cushioning with minimal weight so nothing holds you back.
